column4: mls: no, it finds my wireless mouse, but not the Wireless USB
how can i make my computer recognize a USB device???
anyone know how to make Ubuntu recognize a wireless USB device
check here to see if your usb wireless adapter is supported https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/WirelessCardsSupported#head-603c9481d6c6288b6b674cc50132d21f6d539c53
